column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Next- "Scorched" Okra. If you advertise scorched okra
column2: then served scorched Okra. Your Okra is raw and undercooked (despite it coming out in a little cast iron skillet). Anyone who knows southern food knows that Okra is best cooked in a cast iron pan until it's almost burned "scorched". Yours is raw slime... which paired perfectly with your soggy meatloaf.
